channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oprah Winfrey reveals latest book club pick: "The Tell" by Amy Griffin
item.description: In an exclusive reveal on "CBS Mornings," Oprah Winfrey names "The Tell" by Amy Griffin as her latest book club selection. The memoir details Griffin'...

item.title: Crew member reveals harrowing details of fiery cargo ship crash off U.K.
item.description: A crew member tells CBS News "a massive ship came from out of the blue" and rammed a tanker apparently carrying jet fuel for the U.S. military.

item.title: Dear Life Kit: My best friend said he'd unfriend me if I ever had kids
item.description: A reader is taken aback by her best friend's reaction to the possibility that she might want kids. He says that if she had kids, it would change every...

item.title: Philippines ex-leader Duterte arrested on ICC warrant over drug killings
item.description: Rodrigo Duterte is accused of 'crimes against humanity' in a crackdown that left thousands dead.

item.title: Kurdish-led SDF agrees to integrate with Syrian government forces
item.description: The militia alliance that controls much of north-eastern Syria will merge with new state institutions, the presidency says.

item.title: Musk eyes Social Security and benefit programs for cuts while claiming widespread fraud
item.description: Elon Musk says Social Security and other federal benefit programs will be targeted in his hunt for fraudulent spending.

item.title: 5 years since WHO declared COVID-19 a pandemic

item.title: Reflecting on five years since the COVID-19 pandemic changed the world
item.description: On this day five years ago, the World Health Organization declared COVID-19 a global pandemic, shutting down daily life, crippling the economy and res...

item.title: Largest drone attack of war hits Moscow region
item.description: Three people were killed and another 18 were hurt in the strikes, including three children.

item.title: As Trump downplays economic fears, this data show people feel differently
item.description: Economists look for signs that a recession may be approaching by monitoring consumer confidence and business sentiment — two indicators of uncertainty...

item.title: Sweden says Russia is greatest threat to its security
item.description: The nation's security service says there is a "tangible risk" of the security situation deteriorating further.

item.title: Stock markets fall over tariff concerns. And, fentanyl deaths drop in every state
item.description: The stock market fell yesterday as investors worry that Trump's tariffs will slow the economy and possibly lead the U.S. into a recession. And, fatal ...

item.title: LA district attorney says he won’t support resentencing the Menendez brothers because they lied
New books this week: A foodie memoir, a missing child, witches illustrated, and more

item.title: Trump warns that arrest of Palestinian activist at Columbia will be ‘first of many’
Pakistan militants attack train and take passengers hostage
item.description: Police say at least three people were injured in the attack and it is unclear how many people are being held hostage.

item.title: What to know about this week's 'blood worm moon' total lunar eclipse

item.title: Dow futures inch higher after recession fears fuel plunge
item.description: Dow futures make tepid advance in the wake of a broad market plunge that had the blue-chip index shedding nearly 900 points.
